passives.name: Blackout
passives.effects: You {{tip|disabled ward|disable}} surrounding stealthed wards, as well as {{tip|expose}} and {{tip|true sight|reveal}} nearby stealthed wards and traps while ''Blackout'' is active. Your [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|{{rd|2|1}} '''bonus''' true damage}} to wards.

passives.name: Nightstalker
passives.effects: After being not {{tip|sight|visible}} to enemies for at least 1 second, your next basic attack against a champion is empowered to deal {{as|50 {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}} per 1 Lethality)}} '''bonus''' true damage}} [[on-hit]]. The empowered attack lasts for 4 seconds after being seen by an enemy.

effects_structured.raw: When spotted by a stealthed ward or trap, gain Blackout for 8s (90s cooldown, 400 range).
While Blackout is active, disable nearby stealthed wards and reveal stealthed wards and traps.
Basic attacks deal bonus true damage to wards (melee 2, ranged 1).
After being unseen for 1s, gain Nightstalker for 4s (expires after being seen).
While Nightstalker is ready, your next basic attack vs a champion deals bonus true damage (50 + 1.5 per lethality) on-hit.

simpleDescription: Provides trap and ward detection periodically
